data.meta_description: Join Dan Harris, the Dalai Lama, neuroscientist Richie Davidson, and meditation expert Roshi Joan Halifax in a transformative 10-day course that blends ancient wisdom with cutting-edge science. Learn proven steps to cultivate happiness through insightful sessions on taming the mind, overcoming self-criticism, fostering empathy, and more. Sign up now and discover practical tools to create lasting happiness.
